title: GoMMT, Booking.com and Agoda retain their top spots in the fast-growing Indian travel economy: STAAH
description: According to the STAAH data, representing over 19,000 properties across 90 countries and over 350 integrations, accommodation providers across the board – including India – are adopting holistic commerce strategies aimed to attract the right guest, at the right time. “New and established online channels are making the distribution mix, allowing accommodation providers to be booked according to evolving seasons and updated traveller preferences that span multiple channels,” said Ali.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
